ygData.subject: Re: ebay
ygData.msgSnippet: I think Cloak of Flames is 30% as well, but umm, it s off a dragon (Nagafen), not a frog that a shaman or necro can solo as Shada points out. ;P Ariell
ygData.messageBody:
I think Cloak of Flames is 30% as well, but umm, it's off a dragon
(Nagafen), not a frog that a shaman or necro can solo as Shada points
out. ;P

Ariell Thunderwolf, Karana

"Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" wrote:
>
> i am so bored at work i am surfing the ebay auctions. i think the
> salesmanship is hilarious, how almost all items are touted as the best
> and
> their effects completely exaggerated. two that just made me laugh was
> that
> mistmoore battle drums increase songs by 30% (more like 16% by
> Maravana's
> numbers, and widely believed to be no more than 20%) and the haste
> sash
> increasing attack speed by 30% (more like 15%, the best warrior sword
> in the
> game off Innoruuk is 30%). anyway, just a comment.
>
> Shada Bladestorm, L50 Wood Elf Bard
> Tyria Sarkin, L35 High Elf Wizard
> <Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server
